name: Spirit of the Past BETA
description:
A spirit inside the mansion wakes up after centuries-long sleep. A Wraith that doesn't remember anything about his past, reveals when YOU collect all the journals that were left behind.  

*PROLOGUE GAME BETA*

"Learn to look from yesterday."

- Vanilla Prism, 2020

This is my first game.... hope you enjoy this one as much i enjoy making it.
